sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Going forward we would be using , overview_help.visited.NextExperience so we can remove the overview_help.visited.Sandiego userpreference on upgrades.</description>
        <name>Remove sandiego overview help preference</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[removeSandiegoUserPref();

function removeSandiegoUserPref() {
	if (!pm.isZboot()) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user_preference");
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.addQuery('name', 'overview_help.visited.SanDiego');
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next()) {
			gr.deleteRecord();
		}
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-12 12:10:37</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>98e2beb577be41109b231558ca5a9976</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove sandiego overview help preference</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Unified Navigation UI overview help screens" source="com.glide.polaris.admin.ui_overview">b6bb38a43c35311068bcf327dfe37f50</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_98e2beb577be41109b231558ca5a9976</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-18 13:31:52</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
